    Class that makes the request calls to the server

      • getMostRecent

        public boolean getMostRecent(java.lang.String date1,
                    java.lang.String date2)
        Parameters:
        date1 - String, date one
        date2 - String, date two
        Returns:
        boolean, if the second date is more recent it will return true, otherwise it will return false
